title: Queenscliff beaches; Our journey
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
abstract: Impressions of the local beach at Queenscliff
description: This film is a learning outcome from the "Beaches" group student led investigation program at Queenscliff Primary School. It was undertaken as part of the 2007 Snapshots of Remote Communities Project and was overall winner of the Annual Sprockets and Flares Multimedia Awards. A combination of softwares including Blue Sky technologies and artwork by the students was used in the creation of this work. Two versions are included: 1. Queenscliff beaches - final product 2. Our journey - details the behind-the-scenes and process
